title: Patrick Mahomes
description: An exercise in player cutouts and shadow composition, this piece was built to explore depth and movement. I chose two contrasting uniforms to create separation between elements and build a dynamic rhythm across the layout.
bulletPoints: Visual hierarchy through scale and placement

title: Sua'ali'i Switch Up
description: Focused on documenting Sua'ali'i's transition from NRL to rugby union, this edit sequences his debut Wallabies tour after early league footage. It also served as a test for applying a custom LUT generated by ChatGPT.
bulletPoints: Visual tone adjusted using custom LUT

title: Mavs Final Score
description: A study in restraint, layout, and visual control, this final score graphic used selective color to isolate the Mavericks blue. The photo carries the emotion, supported by clean type and structured framing.

title: FLASHback
description: Practice in cutting together a wide range of clips, commentary, and music to build rhythm and energy was the goal of this project. The aim was to create something that felt cohesive, fast-paced, and emotionally engaging.
bulletPoints: Motion tracking used for added momentum

title: Goosebumps Cover
description: AI tools were used to execute a concept I had clearly in mind for this piece. I generated countless variations, combining them in Photoshop to create a fully art-directed Goosebumps-style tribute to Jonah Lomu.
bulletPoints: AI used under tight creative direction
Composite built through layered image merging
Style and tone guided by nostalgic horror design

title: Saquon Snow Day
description: Aiming to slowly build tension toward one defining moment in Barkley's playoff performance, this project focused on pacing, music timing, and motion tracking to create a sense of anticipation and payoff.
bulletPoints: Audio timing used to shape emotion

title: Blues Starting XV
description: Inspired by the Blues contrasting jersey sponsors, this starting XV graphic was a study in presenting large volumes of text within a tight layout. I used a similar contrast to highlight and create a clear entry point for the viewer.
bulletPoints: Hierarchy managed with scale and weight
Grid structure for clarity and control

title: All Blacks Final Score
description: The image itself inspired this piece, leading me to integrate design into the moment. I used field-textured type to present the final score as part of the grass, merging story and information into one visual.
bulletPoints: Visual hierarchy anchored by focal action
